data.name: DataPilotFieldReference
desc: controls how a data pilot field's results are shown in relation to a selected reference result.

items.name: ReferenceItemName
lines: contains the name of the reference item, when the DataPilotFieldReference.ReferenceItemType is NAMED otherwise is empty

items.name: ReferenceItemType
lines: selects between a named reference item and using the previous or next item for each item from the reference field.

items.name: ReferenceType
lines: contains the type of the reference.
